conclusion: Liquid will flow out from A, B and C.
Predict which container (D, E or F) it will flow into after passing through baffles.
Container A is positioned at the top left of the image.
Container B is positioned next to A, slightly to the right.
Container C is positioned at the top right of the image.
There are baffles positioned diagonally across the image.
Container D is positioned at the bottom left of the image.
Container E is positioned next to D, slightly to the right.
Container F is positioned at the bottom right of the image.
Liquid from A will flow downwards and be directed by the baffles towards container D.
Liquid from B will flow downwards and be directed by the baffles towards container E.
Liquid from C will flow downwards and be directed by the baffles towards container F.
Final answer: Liquid will flow into container D.
